translation: Neither by the study of the Vedas, nor by gifts, nor by sacrifices, nor by severe austerities, can I be seen in this form in the world of men by any other than yourself, O great hero of the Kurus (Arjuna).
commentary: 11.48 Not not? by the study of the Vedas and of Yajnas? Not not? danaih by gifts? Not not? f and? by actions by rituals? Not not? by austerities by austerities? Ugraih severe? Evamrupah in such form? possible (am) possible? I'm I? Nriloke in the world of men? to see to be seen? Tvat than thee? by another by another? Kurupraveer O great hero of the Kurus.Commentary Mere cramming of the texts of the Vedas without
